text: Is debugging in julia harder than py...

elements.text: Is debugging in julia harder than py...

text: yes, the state of debugging is not as polished as python, the most feature-rich debugger I know of is incorporated into julia-vscode. I don’t know many people that use debugger-based workflows, though, people seem to get by using tests and the REPL well enough.

elements.text: yes, the state of debugging is not as polished as python, the most feature-rich debugger I know of is incorporated into julia-vscode. I don’t know many people that use debugger-based workflows, though, people seem to get by using tests and the REPL well enough.

text: Even in R/Python I have just used the REPL and print statements for debugging, but then again I am not a software engineer, more from a stat background. So its not really harder for what I do
